fields.name: EGS Geothermal Reservoir [EGS CHP]
fields.description: This simulates the EGS subsurface geothermal reservoir from which thermal energy is extracted. Its design considers factors such as reservoir temperature, permeability, volume, among other user-defined variables to optimize energy extraction for delivery to the CHP plant.

fields.name: EGS CHP Plant [EGS CHP]
fields.description: This plant converts geothermal thermal energy into electricity and thermal energy for heating. It uses a binary subcritical ORC plant with heat exchangers designed for maximum efficiency and reliability under high-temperature and high-pressure conditions characteristic of geothermal sources.

fields.name: Conversion MWth to MMBTU [EGS CHP]
fields.description: A unit conversion helper technology within the system that translates the thermal energy produced in megawatts thermal (MWth) into million British thermal units (MMBTU), facilitating energy accounting and compatibility with other systems that utilize MMBTU as a unit of measure.

fields.name: Heat Sink [EGS CHP]
fields.description: Represents the component that dissipates excess heat from the system. It can be a physical structure or a conceptual pathway, which safely and efficiently manages thermal energy not converted into power or used for heating.

fields.name: Hydrothermal Geothermal Reservoir [Hydro CHP]
fields.description: This simulates a hydrothermal subsurface geothermal reservoir used for combined heat and power generation. The design evaluates factors such as reservoir temperature, permeability, and volume, optimizing the extraction of thermal energy from natural hydrothermal fluids.

fields.name: Hydrothermal Plant [Hydro CHP]
fields.description: This plant converts hydrothermal energy into electricity and thermal energy for heating. It uses a plant design optimized for hydrothermal sources, ensuring maximum efficiency and reliability under conditions typical of natural geothermal fluids.

fields.name: Conversion MWth to MMBTU [Hydro CHP]
fields.description: A unit conversion helper within the system that translates the thermal energy produced in megawatts thermal (MWth) into million British thermal units (MMBTU), integrating seamlessly with energy systems utilizing MMBTU measurements.

fields.name: Heat Sink [Hydro CHP]
fields.description: Acts as a heat management system to dissipate excess thermal energy from hydrothermal processes. It functions either as a physical unit or a conceptual approach, ensuring the safety and efficiency of the system.

fields.name: EGS Geothermal Reservoir [EGS Binary ORC]
fields.description: EGS-specificEGS reservoir designed to optimize the extraction of thermal energy for electricity generation. Tailored to evaluate variables such as temperature, permeability, and volume.

fields.name: EGS Subcritical Binary ORC Plant [EGS Binary ORC]
fields.description: EGS-specific A geothermal power plant that converts thermal energy into electricity using advanced thermodynamic cycles, designed for high efficiency and stability under geothermal conditions.

fields.name: Hydrothermal Geothermal Reservoir [Hydro Binary ORC]
fields.description: Hydrothermal-specific EGS reservoir designed to optimize the extraction of thermal energy for electricity generation. Tailored to evaluate variables such as temperature, permeability, and volume.

fields.name: Hydrothermal Subcritical Binary ORC Plant [Hydro Binary ORC]
fields.description: Hydrothermal-specific A geothermal power plant that converts thermal energy into electricity using advanced thermodynamic cycles, designed for high efficiency and stability under geothermal conditions.

fields.name: EGS Geothermal Reservoir [EGS Direct Use]
fields.description: EGS-specificEGS reservoir designed to optimize the extraction of thermal energy for electricity generation. Tailored to evaluate variables such as temperature, permeability, and volume.

fields.name: EGS Heat Exchanger [EGS Direct Use]
fields.description: EGS-specific Facilitates efficient thermal energy transfer from geothermal sources to direct use applications, maximizing heat utilization with cutting-edge technology.

fields.name: Conversion kW to MMBTU [EGS Direct Use]
fields.description: EGS-specific Converts electrical power in kilowatts (kW) to thermal energy in million British thermal units (MMBTU), standardizing energy metrics.

fields.name: Hydrothermal Geothermal Reservoir [Hydro Direct Use]
fields.description: Hydrothermal-specificEGS reservoir designed to optimize the extraction of thermal energy for electricity generation. Tailored to evaluate variables such as temperature, permeability, and volume.

fields.name: Hydrothermal Heat Exchanger [Hydro Direct Use]
fields.description: Hydrothermal-specific Facilitates efficient thermal energy transfer from geothermal sources to direct use applications, maximizing heat utilization with cutting-edge technology.

fields.name: Conversion kW to MMBTU [Hydro Direct Use]
fields.description: Converts electrical power in kilowatts (kW) to thermal energy in million British thermal units (MMBTU), standardizing energy metrics.

fields.name: EGS Geothermal Reservoir [EGS CCHP]
fields.description: Simulates a (EGS) reservoir designed to optimize the extraction of thermal energy for electricity generation. Tailored to evaluate variables such as temperature, permeability, and volume.

fields.name: EGS CCHP Plant [EGS CCHP]
fields.description: A plant designed for Combined Cooling, Heating, and Power (CCHP) from geothermal sources, aiming for high efficiency in cogeneration and trigeneration systems.

fields.name: Conversion MWth to MMBTU [EGS CCHP]
fields.description: Translates thermal energy measurements from megawatts thermal (MWth) to million British thermal units (MMBTU), allowing for integration with other energy systems.

fields.name: Heat Sink [EGS CCHP]
fields.description: Dissipates excess thermal energy to maintain operational efficiency and safety, adaptable to physical structures or conceptual heat management strategies.

fields.name: Absorption Chiller [EGS CCHP]
fields.description: Uses thermal energy to provide cooling in a CCHP system, leveraging absorption refrigeration cycles to enhance system efficiency and reduce electricity consumption.

fields.name: Conversion MWth to TOR [EGS CCHP]
fields.description: Converts thermal power from megawatts thermal (MWth) to tons of refrigeration (TOR), standardizing cooling capacity measurements.

fields.name: Hydrothermal Geothermal Reservoir [Hydro CCHP]
fields.description: Simulates an (EGS) reservoir designed to optimize the extraction of thermal energy for electricity generation. Tailored to evaluate variables such as temperature, permeability, and volume.

fields.name: Hydrothermal CCHP Plant [Hydro CCHP]
fields.description: A plant designed for Combined Cooling, Heating, and Power (CCHP) from geothermal sources, aiming for high efficiency in cogeneration and trigeneration systems.

fields.name: Conversion MWth to MMBTU [Hydro CCHP]
fields.description: Translates thermal energy measurements from megawatts thermal (MWth) to million British thermal units (MMBTU), allowing for integration with other energy systems.

fields.name: EGS Geothermal Reservoir [EGS Single Flash]
fields.description: EGS reservoir designed to optimize the extraction of thermal energy for electricity generation. Tailored to evaluate variables such as temperature, permeability, and volume.

fields.name: EGS Single Flash Plant [EGS Single Flash]
fields.description: Operates by flashing pressurized hot fluid into steam to drive turbines for electricity generation, optimized for geothermal sources with single Flash potential.

fields.name: Hydrothermal Geothermal Reservoir [Hydro Single Flash]
fields.description: EGS reservoir designed to optimize the extraction of thermal energy for electricity generation. Tailored to evaluate variables such as temperature, permeability, and volume.

fields.name: Hydrothermal Single Flash Plant [Hydro Single Flash]
fields.description: Operates by flashing pressurized hot fluid into steam to drive turbines for electricity generation, optimized for geothermal sources with single Flash potential.

fields.name: EGS Geothermal Reservoir [EGS Double Flash]
fields.description: EGS reservoir designed to optimize the extraction of thermal energy for electricity generation. Tailored to evaluate variables such as temperature, permeability, and volume.

fields.name: EGS Double Flash Plant [EGS Double Flash]
fields.description: Extracts maximum energy by allowing the geothermal fluid to flash twice at different pressures, enhancing turbine performance and energy efficiency.

fields.name: Hydrothermal Geothermal Reservoir [Hydro Double Flash]
fields.description: EGS reservoir designed to optimize the extraction of thermal energy for electricity generation. Tailored to evaluate variables such as temperature, permeability, and volume.

fields.name: Hydrothermal Double Flash Plant [Hydro Double Flash]
fields.description: Extracts maximum energy by allowing the geothermal fluid to flash twice at different pressures, enhancing turbine performance and energy efficiency.
